Subject: Limitation Act
data: 1 The Limitation Act 1963 came into force on : A 1st January, 1964 B 5th October, 1963 C 1st January, 1965 D 1st October, 1963 Answer: Option [A]

2 What is the limitation period in a suit by a landlord to recover possession from a tenant after the date the tenancy is determined ? A One year B Two years C Six years D Twelve years Answer: Option [D]
3 The limitation period in a suit by a surety against co-surety when the surety pays anything in excess of his own share is : A Two years B Three years C Five years D Twelve years Answer: Option [B]
4 The period of limitation for filing of suit on the basis of a promissory note from the date of it's execution is : A One year B Two years C Three years D Five years Answer: Option [C]
5 The period of limitation for setting aside a sale on execution of decree is : A 120 days B 90 days C 60 dyas D 30 days Answer: Option [D]
